text:
@realDonaldTrump 🇨🇦Is there actually anybody LEFT in the Republican Party??
Your handling of the Coronavirus has been recklessly pathetic causing thousands of American deaths...
40 million unemployed.
Then you gassed your own people while you hid in a bunker.
https://t.co/xJ9lhKVU7n
